CustomField.description: This field is used to count the total amount of assigned resources to this Service Appointment. This is used e.g. in the flow "Work Complete Review" to show the user a preview on how many "Labour Lines" are going to be created after they completed the review process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows the total count of Crew Members assigned to this Service Appointment. When assigning a job to a Crew this could be greater than 1.
CustomField.label: # Assigned Service Resources
